results.content: It's a good training if you already have some knowledge about DRF and React. There are no examples built up from scratch, the trainer just comments parts of code that appear "out of nowhere" and explains what they do.
results.content_html: It's a good training if you already have some knowledge about DRF and React. There are no examples built up from scratch, the trainer just comments parts of code that appear "out of nowhere" and explains what they do.

results.content: Seriously. This is not a course but a presentation. The freely available GitHub links to the code would have been enough. This was clearly money wasted.
results.content_html: Seriously. This is not a course but a presentation. The freely available GitHub links to the code would have been enough. This was clearly money wasted.

results.content: Attention to details is fantastic. Support for multiple OS during the setup step was very vital.

results.content: Very good content, very experimented instructor.
